title: Lynch syndrome in Mexican-Mestizo families: Genotype, phenotypes, and challenges in cascade testing among relatives at risk
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Pamela Rivero-García, Yanin Chavarri-Guerra, José Luis Rodríguez Olivares, Jeffrey N. Weitzel, Josef Herzog, Fernando Candanedo-González, Javier Ríos-Valencia, Osvaldo M. Mutchinick, Jazmín Arteaga-Vázquez
